<td colspan="1" style="vertical-align: bottom; width: 15%; border-bottom: 2px 
solid rgb(0, 0, 0);">
<div><font style="text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman; vertical-
align: bottom; display: inline-block; width: 10%; font-size: 13px;">&#xA0; 
</font><font style="text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman; vertical-
align: bottom; display: inline-block; width: 5%; font-size: 13px;">$</font><font
style="text-align: right; font-family: Times New Roman; vertical-align: bottom; 
display: inline-block; width: 75%; font-size: 13px;">0.03</font><font 
style="text-align: left; font-family: Times New Roman; vertical-align: bottom; 
display: inline-block; width: 10%; font-size: 13px;">&#xA0; 
</font></div></td></tr></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">These 
quotations reflect inter-dealer prices, without retail mark-up, mark-down or 
commissions and may not represent actual transactions.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">The 
market for our common stock has been sporadic and there have been significant 
periods during which there were few, if any, transactions in the common stock 
and no reported quotations. Accordingly, reliance should not be placed on the 
quotes listed above, as the trades and depth of the market may be limited, and 
therefore, such quotes may not be a true indication of
the current market value of the Company&#x2019;s common stock.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">On 
December 31, 2015, we had 86 shareholders of record of our common 
stock.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">Capitalization</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">On 
November 11, 2015, our board of directors and stockholders holding a majority of
our voting shares authorized the following actions:</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 24px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 24px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font style="font-family: 
Symbol, Serif">&#xB7;</font></font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Adoption of an omnibus equity 
incentive plan for directors, officers, and 
consultants;</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 24px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 24px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font style="font-family: 
Symbol, Serif">&#xB7;</font></font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Adoption of Amended and Restated 
Articles of Incorporation filed with the Secretary of State of Nevada to effect 
the following:</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 72px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 24px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#x25AA;</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">authorize our board of directors to 
change our corporate name to a name selected by our 
directors;</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 72px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 24px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#x25AA;</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">establish corporate codes and 
committees of the board of directors;</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 72px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 24px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#x25AA;</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">increase the number of shares of 
capital stock we are authorized to issue; and</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 72px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 24px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#x25AA;</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">authorize the issuance of preferred 
stock with preferences, limitations, and relative rights designated by our board
of directors.</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 72px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 24px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#x25AA;</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">authorize indemnification agreements 
with directors and senior officers&#x37E; and</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 72px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 24px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#x25AA;</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">adopt a serial board of directors and 
other measures that are intended to be anti-takeover 
provisions.</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div id="pgbrk" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-
right: 0px">
<div id="ftr">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0; </font></div>
<div style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">11</font></div></div>
<div id="pb" style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; 
margin-bottom: 6px; page-break-after: always; width: 100%; height: 2px; 
background-color: #000000">
<!--page break-->
</div>
<div id="hdr">
<div style="text-align: right; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:
0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0; </font></div></div></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="text-align: left; width: 100%; 
font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">
<tr>
<td style="width: 10%; vertical-align: top;">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">ITEM 5.</font></div></td>
<td style="width: 90%">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font 
style="font-weight: bold">MARKET FOR REGISTRANT&#x2019;S COMMON EQUITY, RELATED 
STOCKHOLDER MATTERS AND ISSUER PURCHASES OF EQUITY SECURITIES </font><font 
style="font-style: 
italic">(continued)</font></font></div></td></tr></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">On 
November 24, 2015, the board of directors authorized the following changes to 
our capitalization:</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Our 
authorized capital was increased from 100,000,000 shares of common stock with a 
par value of $0.00001 per share to 500,000,000 shares of capital stock, divided 
into 480,000,000 shares of common stock with a par value of $0.001 per share, 
and 20,000,000 shares of preferred stock with a par value of $0.001 par value 
per share. No shares of preferred stock have been issued
to date.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">There 
are no present plans, understandings or agreements, and we are not engaged in 
any negotiations that will involve the issuance of capital stock. However, the
board of directors believes it prudent to have shares of common and preferred 
stock available for such corporate purposes as the board of directors may from 
time to time deem necessary and advisable including,
without limitation, acquisitions, the raising of additional capital and 
assurance of flexibility of action in the future.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">We 
believe that the Amended and Restated Articles of Incorporation will provide a 
greater measure of flexibility and simplicity in corporate governance and will 
increase the marketability of our securities. Nevada has adopted a modern code 
governing the formation and operation of corporations. In addition, the Nevada 
law provides for greater flexibility in raising capital
and other corporate transactions. Nevada imposes no franchise taxes or corporate
income taxes on corporations that are incorporated in Nevada.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times
New Roman">Securities Authorized for Issuance under Equity Compensation 
Plans</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">As part
of the November 24, 2015 changes to our capitalization, we reserved 10,000,000 
shares of common stock for issuance under a new 2016 Omnibus Equity Incentive 
Plan. The purpose of the Plan is to maintain our ability to attract and retain 
highly qualified and experienced directors, officers and consultants and to give
such directors, officers and consultants a continued
proprietary interest in our success. The Plan is posted on our website at 
www.lodestarmining.com and is available to any stockholder by request to us. To 
date, 1,469,825 shares of common stock and warrants to purchase 3,336,060 shares
of common stock have been issued under the Equity Incentive Plan. None of those 
warrants have been exercised.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">Immediately upon the grant of any award, the number of shares that may be
issued or optioned under the plan will be increased such that the total number 
of shares issuable under the plan and reserved for issuance upon exercise of 
outstanding options, warrants or conversion of shares of preferred stock will 
equal 10% of the total number of issued and outstanding shares.
Such increase in the number of shares subject to the plan shall occur without 
the necessity of any further corporate action of any kind or 
character.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">Dividends</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">We have
not declared any cash dividends, nor do we have any plans to do so. Management 
anticipates that, for the foreseeable future, all available cash will be needed 
to fund our operations.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times
New Roman">Penny Stock</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Our 
common stock is subject to the provisions of Section 15(g) of the Exchange Act 
and Rule 15g-9 thereunder, commonly referred to as the &#x201C;penny stock 
rule&#x201D;.&#xA0;&#xA0;Section 15(g) sets forth certain requirements for 
transactions in penny stock, and Rule 15g-9(d) incorporates the definition of 
&#x201C;penny stock&#x201D; that is found in Rule 3a51-1 of the
Exchange Act.&#xA0;&#xA0;The SEC generally defines a penny stock to be any 
equity security that has a market price less than $5.00 per share, subject to 
certain exceptions.&#xA0;&#xA0;We are subject to the SEC&#x2019;s penny stock 
rules.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Since 
our common stock is deemed to be penny stock, trading in the shares of our 
common stock is subject to additional sales practice requirements on broker-
dealers who sell penny stock to persons other than established customers and 
accredited investors.&#xA0;&#xA0;&#x201C;Accredited investors&#x201D; are 
generally persons with assets in excess of $1,000,000 or annual income
exceeding $200,000 or $300,000 together with their spouse.&#xA0;&#xA0;For 
transactions covered by these rules, broker-dealers must make a special 
suitability determination for the purchase of securities and must have the 
purchaser&#x2019;s written consent to the transaction prior to the 
purchase.&#xA0;&#xA0;Additionally, for any transaction involving a penny stock, 
unless exempt, the rules require the delivery, prior to the first transaction, 
of a risk disclosure document prepared by the SEC relating to the penny
stock market.&#xA0;&#xA0;A broker-dealer also must disclose the commissions 
payable to both the broker-dealer and the registered representative and current 
quotations for the securities.&#xA0;&#xA0;Finally, monthly statements must be 
sent disclosing recent price information for penny stocks held in an account and
information to the limited market in penny stocks.&#xA0;&#xA0;Consequently, 
these rules may restrict the ability of broker-dealer to trade and/or maintain a
market in our common stock and may affect
the ability of our stockholders to sell their shares.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div id="pgbrk" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-
right: 0px">
<div id="ftr">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0; </font></div>
<div style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">12</font></div></div>
<div id="pb" style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; 
margin-bottom: 6px; page-break-after: always; width: 100%; height: 2px; 
background-color: #000000">
<!--page break-->
</div>
<div id="hdr">
<div style="text-align: right; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:
0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0; </font></div></div></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:
0px">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="text-align: left; width: 100%; 
font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">
<tr>
<td style="width: 10%; vertical-align: top;">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">ITEM 5.</font></div></td>
<td style="width: 90%">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font 
style="font-weight: bold">MARKET FOR REGISTRANT&#x2019;S COMMON EQUITY, RELATED 
STOCKHOLDER MATTERS AND ISSUER PURCHASES OF EQUITY SECURITIES </font><font 
style="font-style: 
italic">(continued)</font></font></div></td></tr></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times
New Roman">Recent Sales of Unregistered Securities</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">During 
the year ended December 31, 2015, we had no cash subscriptions for shares of its
common stock.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">On 
November 11, 2015, we entered into a one year agreement to obtain assistance in 
conducting business strategy and communications planning, public financial 
disclosure reporting, and various matters in connection with directors and other
professionals as needed by us. In consideration for the services to be provided,
we granted the consultant 1,469,825 shares of common
stock. Those shares were issued on December 11, 2015 and were valued at $29,397,
based on market price at the date of the agreement. In addition, the consultant 
was granted warrants with a five year term, commencing the date of the 
agreement, to purchase 3,336,060 shares of common stock at a price of $0.02 per 
share, including a cashless exercise option. The warrants were valued at $66,721
using the Black-Scholes option pricing model.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">The 
shares and warrants issued to the consultant were offered and sold in a private 
transaction in reliance upon the exemption from registration pursuant to Section
4(2) of the Securities Act.&#xA0;&#xA0;Our reliance on Section 4(2) of the 
Securities Act was based upon the following factors: (a) the issuance of the 
securities was an isolated private transaction by us which
did not involve a public offering; (b) there was only one offeree; (c) we did 
not engage in any subsequent or contemporaneous public offerings of securities; 
(d) the securities were not broken down into smaller denominations; and (e) the 
negotiations for the sale of the stock took place directly between the 
consultant and us.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">On 
January 9, 2015, we reached agreements in connection with the loans to us of 
$24,696 (CAD $28,650) and $1,767 (CAD $2,050) whereby the loan amounts were to 
be converted to our common shares at a price of CAD $0.05, to result in the 
issuance of 573,000 and 41,000 common shares respectively. Those shares were 
issued on April 6, 2015.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">On 
January 9, 2015, an agreement was reached to modify the terms of a loan to us 
such that $26,750 of accrued interest together with a premium was to be 
converted to our common shares at a price of $0.05 per share, to result in the 
issuance of 535,000 common shares. Those shares were issued on April 6, 
2015.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Other 
than as described above, or as disclosed in previous reports filed on Forms 10-
Q, 10-K or 8-K, we have not issued any equity securities that were not 
registered under the Securities Act within the past three years.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="text-align: left; width: 100%; 
font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">
<tr>
<td style="width: 10%; vertical-align: top;">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">ITEM 6.</font></div></td>
<td style="width: 90%">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New

<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:

Roman">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">We are a 
smaller reporting company as defined by Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act and are 
not required to provide the information under this item.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:

font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">

<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:

<td style="width: 90%">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">MANAGEMENT&#x2019;S DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS OF FINANCIAL CONDITION AND 
RESULTS OF OPERATIONS.</font></div></td></tr></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">The 
following discussion and analysis of our financial condition and results of 
operations should be read in conjunction with our audited financial statements 
and related notes appearing elsewhere in this report. In addition to historical 
financial information, the following discussion includes a number of forward-
looking statements that reflect our plans, estimates and
our current views with respect to future events and financial performance. See 
&#x201C;<font style="font-weight: bold">Cautionary Note Regarding Forward 
Looking Statements</font>&#x201D; above for a discussion of forward-looking 
statements and the significance of such statements in the context of this 
Report.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times
New Roman">Plan of Operations</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">We 
anticipate that we will require approximately $2 million to pursue our plan of 
operations over the next 12 months, as detailed below:</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-style: italic; font-size: 
13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Permitting</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Our 
primary focus now is on the mine permitting process. We have retained the 
following specialists in underground permitting of narrow vein, high sulphide 
mines to assist in executing that permitting process:</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 24px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 24px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font style="font-family: 
Symbol, Serif">&#xB7;</font></font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Rubicon Environmental Consulting to 
act as the lead consultant</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 24px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 24px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font style="font-family: 
Symbol, Serif">&#xB7;</font></font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Hydrogeologica Inc. to consult on 
water and geology</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 24px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 24px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font style="font-family: 
Symbol, Serif">&#xB7;</font></font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Tierra Group International to consult 
on mine planning and engineering</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div id="pgbrk" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-
right: 0px">
<div id="ftr">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0; </font></div>
<div style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New
Roman">13</font></div></div>
<div id="pb" style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; 
margin-bottom: 6px; page-break-after: always; width: 100%; height: 2px; 
background-color: #000000">
<!--page break-->
</div>
<div id="hdr">
<div style="text-align: right; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:
0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0; </font></div></div></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="text-align: left; width: 100%; 
font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">
<tr>
<td style="width: 10%; vertical-align: top;">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">ITEM 7.</font></div></td>
<td style="width: 90%">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font 
style="font-weight: bold">MANAGEMENT&#x2019;S DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS OF 
FINANCIAL CONDITION AND RESULTS OF OPERATIONS. </font><font style="font-style: 
italic">(continued)</font></font></div></td></tr></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Unique 
to our permitting is the proposed underground area of work named the Red Hills 
Stope Zone. It is 150 feet above the 450 foot deep water table, making the mine 
essentially a dry mine.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">The 
mine&#x2019;s 300 foot level workings has pockets of unused volume where our 
potentially acid generating waste rock can be stored. This means no waste rock 
will come to the surface and LSM will avoid, for the short-term, the expense of 
having to build and maintain a surface storage facility.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">We are 
hopeful that the two aforementioned mitigating circumstances will make our 
permitting process more rapid and therefore, the costs of execution and 
infrastructure improvements will be kept at a minimum.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">Permitting costs are anticipated as follows:</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 24px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:
0px">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="text-align: left; width: 40%;

<td style="border-right: solid 2px black; width: 9%; border-bottom: 2px solid 
black">
<div style="text-align: right; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">$720,000</font></div></td></tr></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:
0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font 
style="text-decoration: underline">Toll Milling</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:
0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">We have no 
facilities to process ore and are negotiating with local mill operators to have 
our ore processed.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">Funding</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">We do 
not currently have sufficient funds to carry out our entire plan of operations, 
so we intend to meet the balance of our cash requirements for the next 12 months
through a combination of debt financing and equity financing through private 
placements.&#xA0;&#xA0;Currently we are active in contacting broker/dealers 
regarding possible financing arrangements; however,
we do not currently have any arrangements in place to complete any private 
placement financings and there is no assurance&#xA0;that we will be successful 
in completing any such financings.&#xA0;&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">If we 
are unsuccessful in obtaining sufficient funds through our capital raising 
efforts, we may review other financing options, although we cannot provide any 
assurance that any such options will be available to us or on terms reasonably 
acceptable to us.&#xA0;Further, if we are unable to secure any additional 
financing then we plan to reduce the amount that we spend
on our operations, including our management-related consulting fees and other 
general expenses, so as not to exceed the capital resources available to 
us.&#xA0;Regardless, our current cash reserves and working capital will not be 
sufficient for us to sustain our business for the next 12 months, even if we 
decide to scale back our operations.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">Going Concern</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Our 
auditors have issued a going concern opinion. This means that there is 
substantial doubt that we can continue as an on-going business for the next 
twelve months unless we obtain additional capital to pay our expenses. This is 
because we have not generated any revenues to date and we cannot currently 
estimate the timing of any possible future revenues. Our only source
for cash at this time is investments by others in our common stock, or 
loans.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times
New Roman">Intellectual Property</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">We do 
not own any intellectual property and we have not filed for any protection of 
our trademark.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times
New Roman">Personnel</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">We have
no employees. Our president and CEO, Mark Walmesley, receives no compensation 
for his services. We expect to continue to use outside consultants, advisors, 
attorneys and accountants as necessary.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Robert 
Baker, our former Corporate Secretary and Director, resigned from his positions 
with us effective April 17, 2015. Mr. Baker was previously our President and 
CEO.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div id="pgbrk" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-
right: 0px">
<div id="ftr">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0; </font></div>
<div style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">15</font></div></div>
<div id="pb" style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; 
margin-bottom: 6px; page-break-after: always; width: 100%; height: 2px; 
background-color: #000000">
<!--page break-->
</div>
<div id="hdr">
<div style="text-align: right; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:
0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0; </font></div></div></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="text-align: left; width: 100%; 
font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">
<tr>
<td style="width: 10%; vertical-align: top;">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">ITEM 7.</font></div></td>
<td style="width: 90%">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font 
style="font-weight: bold">MANAGEMENT&#x2019;S DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS OF 
FINANCIAL CONDITION AND RESULTS OF OPERATIONS. </font><font style="font-style: 
italic">(continued)</font></font></div></td></tr></table></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">On 
January 19, 2015, Thomas Temkin was appointed as Chief Operating Officer and to 
the Board of Directors. Mr. Temkin is a Certified Professional Geologist and a 
Qualified Person under National Instrument (NI) 43101, with more than 38 years 
of experience in the mining industry, primarily in exploration in the Western 
United States. He is currently a consulting geologist
working with LSG. Mr. Temkin has been associated with LSG and the Property for 
over 15 years and has been instrumental through its entire exploration program 
to date.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">On 
April 22, 2015, Pam Walters was appointed as our Corporate Secretary to replace 
Robert Baker. Ms. Walters has been associated with the mining industry for over 
25 years and has managed the corporate finance and business operations of LSG 
and its owners.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Other 
than our three officers, who currently receive no compensation from us, we have 
no employees. We plan to rely on the efforts of our officers and directors, as 
well as a number of independent consultants, to manage our 
operations.&#xA0;&#xA0;However, we may hire workers on a contract basis from 
time to time as the need arises.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times
New Roman">Government Regulations</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">We plan
to engage in mineral exploration and are accordingly exposed to environmental 
risks associated with mineral exploration activity.&#xA0;&#xA0;LSG is currently 
in the exploration stage on the Property and, pursuant to the Option Agreement, 
once formal work plans are mutually agreed between us and LSG, we will be the 
operator.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">In 
general, in Nevada, no government permits are required on mining claims for 
exploration activities which do not involve the use of powered 
equipment.&#xA0;&#xA0;Any disturbance of existing land and vegetation by powered
means will generally require a permit which will specify that after work is 
completed land be re-contoured to the original surface and be seeded with
native plant species.&#xA0;&#xA0;On unpatented claims with federally-owned 
surface, a &#x201C;Notice of Intent&#x201D; must be filed with the BLM for all 
activities involving the disturbance of five acres (two hectares) or less of the
surface.&#xA0;&#xA0;A Notice of Intent will include details on the company 
submitting the notice, maps of the proposed disturbance, equipment to be 
utilized, the general schedule of operations, a calculation of the total 
disturbance anticipated, and a detailed reclamation plan and
budget.&#xA0;&#xA0;A bond will be required to ensure reclamation and the amount 
will be determined by the calculated acreage being disturbed.&#xA0;&#xA0;The 
notice does not have an approval process associated with it but the bond 
calculation does have to be approved with a letter from the BLM before work can 
proceed.&#xA0;&#xA0;It is not necessary to file a Notice of Intent prior to work
on land with privately owned surface.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">Measurement of land disturbance is cumulative, and once five acres total 
has been disturbed on one project, a &#x201C;Plan of Operations&#x201D; must be 
filed and approved by the BLM before additional work can take
place.&#xA0;&#xA0;This too requires a cash bond along with a reclamation 
plan.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">LSG is 
not required to file a Notice of Intent for the Property with the BLM; instead, 
it is required to file one with the Department of Environmental Protection of 
the State of Nevada (NDEP), since the only portion of the Property that has 
publicly-owned surface rights is that which overlaps the Goldfield town limits. 
This form of notice includes the same information
as the BLM Notice of Intent except that a detailed reclamation plan, budget and 
bond are not required.&#xA0;&#xA0;The notice also has a very informal approval 
process associated with it.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">LSG is 
currently operating under a Notice of Intent filed with the NDEP and dated 
January, 2011.&#xA0;&#xA0;This is an open-ended permit that does not require 
bonding for reclamation and allows for a total of five acres of 
disturbance.&#xA0;&#xA0;We do not have any pending Notices of 
Intent.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">To the 
best of our knowledge, there are no existing environmental liabilities on the 
Property.&#xA0;&#xA0;A detailed environmental investigation has not been 
conducted.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div id="pgbrk" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-
right: 0px">
<div id="ftr">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0; </font></div>
<div style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">16</font></div></div>
<div id="pb" style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; 
margin-bottom: 6px; page-break-after: always; width: 100%; height: 2px; 
background-color: #000000">
<!--page break-->
</div>
<div id="hdr">
<div style="text-align: right; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:
0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0; </font></div></div></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="text-align: left; width: 100%; 
font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">
<tr>
<td style="width: 10%; vertical-align: top;">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New

<td style="width: 90%">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font 
style="font-weight: bold">MANAGEMENT&#x2019;S DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS OF 
FINANCIAL CONDITION AND RESULTS OF OPERATIONS. </font><font style="font-style:

<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">Results of Operations</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">The 
following summary of our results of operations should be read in conjunction 
with our
restated audited financial statements for the year ended December 31, 2015 which
are included with this Report. See &#x201C;Cautionary Note Regarding Forward 
Looking Statements&#x201D; above for a discussion of forward-looking statements 
and the significance of such statements in the context of this 
Report.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:

<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font 
style="text-decoration: underline">Consulting services</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">Approximately $25,000 was incurred in 2015 for consulting services to 
maintain a solid corporate and marketing presence in Vancouver, Canada. This was
required as Vancouver is a major Canadian centre for the mining industry, the 
majority of our shareholders (other than LSG) are located in Canada, and our CEO
is now located in Houston, Texas. In addition, a consulting
agreement was entered into in 2015 for a range of business development services,
accounting for approximately a further $96,000 in consulting services costs. The
2014 consulting expense was comprised of amounts paid to our former President 
and CEO under the terms of a consulting agreement which was terminated after 
July, 2014.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font 
style="text-decoration: underline">Corporate support 
services</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">Approximately $5,000 was incurred with our provider of corporate support 
services in Vancouver, compared to approximately $3,000 in 2014, with the 
increase being due to a higher level of activity related to regulatory filings 
and share issuances in 2015. In addition, $8,000 was incurred for services from 
the Depository Trust Company in 2015, with no equivalent in the
prior year.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font 
style="text-decoration: underline">Interest, bank and finance 
charges</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">The 
increase in interest expense in 2015 was due to a net increase of approximately 
$206,000 in interest-bearing loans during the year.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div id="pgbrk" style="width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; text-indent: 0px; margin-
right: 0px">
<div id="ftr">
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0; </font></div>
<div style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px; width: 100%"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">17</font></div></div>
<div id="pb" style="text-align: center; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; 
margin-bottom: 6px; page-break-after: always; width: 100%; height: 2px; 
background-color: #000000">

0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font 
style="font-weight: bold">MANAGEMENT&#x2019;S DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS OF 
FINANCIAL CONDITION AND RESULTS OF OPERATIONS. </font><font style="font-style: 
italic">(continued)</font></font></div></td></tr></table></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px">
<font style="text-decoration: underline; color: #000000; font-family: Times New 
Roman; font-size: 13px">Mineral option fees</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px">
<font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px">
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 
13px">Approximately $124,000 of mineral option fees were payable at December 31,
2015 under the terms of our Mineral Option Agreement with LSG. No such fees were
due under the terms of that agreement at December 31, 2014.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 
13px;">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font 
style="text-decoration: underline">Office, foreign exchange and 
sundry</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Key 
items that resulted in the year over year increase in this expense category were
approximately $2,000 for licenses and permits to the State of Nevada ($Nil in 
2014) in connection with our activities related to our mineral property interest
located there, and approximately $8,000 related to tradeshows, including 
accommodation and travel ($Nil in 2014).</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font 
style="text-decoration: underline">Transfer and filing fees</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">Transfer agent fees increased approximately $3,000 in 2015 compared to 
the prior year, due mainly to there being four separate share issuances in 2015 
versus one issuance in 2014. In addition, a $10,000 fee was required to be paid 
to OTC Markets Group in order to have our stock continue to be designated as 
trading on the OTCQB marketplace and to subscribe to certain OTC
Markets Groups&#x2019; services. This is now an annual requirement, but there 
was no equivalent in 2014.</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">Assets and Liabilities</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Balance Sheet 
items with notable year over year differences are as follows:</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 
13px;">&#xA0;</font></div>

<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 60px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 32px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">&#xB7;</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font style="text-decoration: 
underline">Cash </font>increased due to the amount of cash provided by loans 
being approximately $7,000 higher than the amount of cash used by operating 
activities.</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 60px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 32px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">&#xB7;</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font style="text-decoration: 
underline">Prepaid fees</font> increased due to a $20,000 retainer for legal 
services being paid in 2015, of which approximately $17,000 was expensed and 
included in accrued liabilities for services incurred during the 
year.</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 60px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 32px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">&#xB7;</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font style="text-decoration: 
underline">Accounts payable and accrued liabilities</font> decreased mainly due 
to the following items:</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 84px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 32px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font style="font-family: 
Symbol, Serif">&#xB0;</font></font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Legal fees payable increased 
approximately $3,000, primarily due to advice required in 2015 with respect to 
filing of US tax returns</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 84px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 32px"><font 
style="font-family: Symbol;"><font style="font-size: 
13px;">&#xB0;</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Accounting and audit fees payable 
decreased approximately $6,000, primarily as a result of 2014 balances of 
approximately $12,000 due to our previous auditors being paid off, offset by 
2015 accruals of $4,000 for our new auditors and approximately $2,000 for an
accounting consultant</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 84px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 32px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font style="font-family: 
Symbol, Serif">&#xB0;</font></font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Fees due to our former president and 
CEO of approximately $15,000 were paid off in 
2015</font></font></div></div></div>
<div style="display: table; margin-left: 84px">
<div style="display: table-row">
<div style="text-align: left; display: table-cell; width: 32px"><font><font 
style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font style="font-family: 
Symbol, Serif">&#xB0;</font></font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; display: table-cell"><font><font style="font-
size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">A total of approximately $6,000 in 
2014 payables, comprised of IT consulting services, Corporate support services, 
and miscellaneous expenses due to our current CEO were paid off in 
2015.</font></font></div></div></div>

totaling approximately $26,000;</font></div> </div> </div>

which was the accounting value of shares issued in three debt settlements, less

$1,470</font></div> </div> </div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 
13px;">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">Liquidity and Capital Resources</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">Our financial 
condition for the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014 and the changes between
those periods for the respective items are summarized below:</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">As of 
December 31, 2015, our total assets were $245,853 (2014 - $235,552) and our 
total liabilities were $<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New 
Roman; font-size: 13px">585,866</font>(2014 - $313,575). At December 31, 2015, 
we had cash of $12,456 (2014 - $5,372) and negative working capital of $570,193 
(2014 - $308,203).</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New 
Roman">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman"><font 
style="text-decoration: underline">Working Capital</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent:

<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 
13px;">&#xA0;</font></div>
<div style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-
indent: 0px"><font style="font-size: 13px; font-family: Times New Roman">The 
decrease in our working capital from December 31, 2014 to December 31, 2015 was 
due to increases in cash of approximately $7,000 and prepaid fees of 
approximately $3,000, together with a decrease in accounts payable and accrued 
liabilities of approximately $24,000
<font style="color: #000000; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: 13px">and 
in loans payable of approximately $60,000, all offset by accrued mineral option 
fees of approximately $124,000 and a net increase in loans, accrued interest, 
and expenses paid on our behalf by related parties totaling approximately 
$231,000.</font></font></div>
<div style="text-align: left; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; text-indent: 
0px"><font>&#xA0;</font></div>
